intent_atoms.description: Integrate FoundationUI components into the application by replacing native SwiftUI elements with DS components and ensuring snapshot testing integration.

All Phase 1 tasks (I1.1–I1.5) must be completed and verified on 2025-11-14, including badge & status indicators, card containers, key-value rows, form controls, advanced layouts, responsive behavior, accessibility, and dark mode support.
FoundationUI integration tasks cannot begin until Phase 0 is complete.
Use FoundationUI grid and spacing system for layout patterns in Advanced Layouts & Navigation (I1.5).
Create SDK Tolerant Parsing Documentation with DocC article, code examples, and inline documentation updates.
Documentation must be verified against test file in Tests/ISOInspectorKitTests/ and linked from main Documentation.md Topics section.
Implement Floating Settings Panel Shell (C21) using FoundationUI cards and macOS NSPanel or iPad/iOS .sheet detents.
Snapshot and accessibility tests must validate both macOS and iOS presentations.
C22 cannot be thread permanent changes through UserPreferencesStore only after C21 is completed.
